languages.text: {n}Маражай вздыхает, не скрывая разочарования.{/n} "В таком случае я найду себе занятие поинтереснее, чем пытаться пробиться сквозь завесу твоего невежества".

{n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай вздыхает, не скрывая разочарования.{/n} "В таком случае я найду себе занятие поинтереснее, чем пытаться пробиться сквозь завесу твоего невежества".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai rolls his eyes and sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."

{n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai suspira sin molestarse en ocultar su decepción.{/n} «Entonces tendré que buscar algo que hacer. Algo más interesante que intentar atravesar el velo de tu ignorancia».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai suspira sin molestarse en ocultar su decepción.{/n} «Entonces tendré que buscar algo que hacer. Algo más interesante que intentar atravesar el velo de tu ignorancia».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは失望もあらわにため息をつく。{/n}「仕方ねえ…なら、何か夢中になれる別のことでも見つけるとするか。お前が纏う無知という名のヴェールを破り去るよりも、もっと楽しいことをな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは失望もあらわにため息をつく。{/n}「仕方ねえ…なら、何か夢中になれる別のことでも見つけるとするか。お前が纏う無知という名のヴェールを破り去るよりも、もっと楽しいことをな」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋叹了口气，毫不掩饰他的失望之情。{/n}“那我就找点别的事来做吧，比拆穿你那无知的面纱更有意思的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋叹了口气，毫不掩饰他的失望之情。{/n}“那我就找点别的事来做吧，比拆穿你那无知的面纱更有意思的事情。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai soupire sans chercher à cacher sa déception.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je trouverai autre chose pour m'occuper. Quelque chose de plus excitant que tenter de percer le voile de votre ignorance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai soupire sans chercher à cacher sa déception.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je trouverai autre chose pour m'occuper. Quelque chose de plus excitant que tenter de percer le voile de votre ignorance. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai seufzt, er verbirgt seine Enttäuschung nicht.{/n} "Dann werde ich etwas anderes finden, um mich zu beschäftigen. Etwas, was aufregender ist als der Versuch, den Schleier Eurer Ignoranz zu durchbrechen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai seufzt, er verbirgt seine Enttäuschung nicht.{/n} "Dann werde ich etwas anderes finden, um mich zu beschäftigen. Etwas, was aufregender ist als der Versuch, den Schleier Eurer Ignoranz zu durchbrechen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai iç çekiyor. Hayal kırıklığını hiç saklamıyor.{/n} "O zaman kendimi meşgul edecek başka bir şey, cehaletinin perdesini aralamaya çalışmaktan daha heyecanlı bir şey bulurum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sighs, making no secret of his disappointment.{/n} "Then I will find something else to occupy myself with, something more exciting than attempting to pierce through the veil of your ignorance."
